title: Shaco Skin Concept
body: Something that i thought could be quite cool is an 'Unmasked Shaco' skin, i would love for someone to actually visually create this.

replies.body:
So something like these?
http://2.images.gametrailers.com/images/moses/moviesthumbs/706200-t_assassinscb_harlequin_visio.jpg?
http://cdn.cgmagonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/batmandeathinsert4.jpg

The second one is death of the family joker. Its when he cuts of his face to prove to batman that even when he removes his mask, he is still the joker and that he is like that too, when he takes of his batman mask, he is still batman in his heart. However, he doesnt believe the rest of the bat family are the same so he straps his face back on and proceeds on killing the bat family in order to "help batman become stronger" since he sees them as making him weak.

The first is from assasins creed and I do like the guys mask for some reason... idk.

im pretty sure Asylum shaco is closest to an unmasked shaco

But if they could make a Mortal Shaco skin where he looks human, i spose that would be cool. As long as they dont make his puffs of smoke bright orange, i may consider getting it over Masked Shaco.
